channel.title: Join us on Grad Student Writing Group at the University of Delaware
channel.description: Recent content in Join us on Grad Student Writing Group at the University of Delaware

item.title: Join us
item.description: If you have any questions, please contact Nami Sunami (nsunami@udel.edu). You can check us out on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/writinghens/) or on Twitter as well (https://twitter.com/WritingHens) Further help from the writing center The writing group is mainly intended as a self-help group for accontability. If you need individualized assistance on grammer and editing etc., please check out Writing Center for their wonderful resources!
